宿: (estalagem/pousada) - inn , lodging, inn, hotel; house, home, dwelling; home of a servant's parents (or guarantor, etc.)
宿す: (やどす) - to keep (guest); to conceive; to carry (virus); to entrust
宿り木: (やどりぎ) - mistletoe (esp. European mistletoe, Viscum album); parasitic plant
宿る: (やどる) - to dwell/to live/to remain; to stay at/to take shelter at/to stop at/to lodge at; to be pregnant; to be part of a constellation; to be a parasite (bugs, plants, etc.)
宿下がり: (やどさがり) - (short-term) leave allowed a servant
宿代: (やどだい) - hotel charges (for lodging, not meals, etc.)
宿便: (しゅくべん) - feces contained long in the intestines; fecal stasis; coprostasis
宿借: (ヤドカリ) - hermit crab; (宿借り, 宿借 only) renting a house; (宿借り, 宿借 only) tenant
宿借り: (ヤドカリ) - hermit crab; (宿借り, 宿借 only) renting a house; (宿借り, 宿借 only) tenant
宿命通: (しゅくみょうつう) - knowledge of previous lifetimes (one of the six supernormal Buddhist powers)
宿営地: (しゅくえいち) - cantonment; encampment; etape
宿坊: (しゅくぼう) - visitor's or pilgrims' lodgings in a temple; priest's quarters
宿場: (しゅくば) - relay station (esp. on Edo-period highway); post station; stage
宿場町: (しゅくばまち) - inn town; post town; post-station town
宿弊: (しゅくへい) - longstanding abuse; deep-rooted evil
宿引き: (やどひき) - hotel or lodging house tout
宿怨: (しゅくえん) - old grudge; old score
宿恨: (しゅっこん) - old grudge; old score
宿悪: (しゅくあく) - old evils; evils committed in a previous existence
宿意: (しゅくい) - longstanding opinion; old grudge
宿敵: (しゅくてき) - old enemy; longtime enemy; arch-enemy; traditional rival; longstanding foe
宿星: (しゅくせい) - star of fate; a zodiac
宿曜: (しゅくよう) - form of astrology based on the Xiuyaojing
宿曜経: (すくようぎょう) - Xiuyaojing (Indian astrological text written by Amoghavajra)
宿曜道: (すくようどう) - form of astrology based on the Xiuyaojing (brought to Japan in the Heian period)
宿木: (やどりぎ) - mistletoe (esp. European mistletoe, Viscum album); parasitic plant
宿木鶇: (ヤドリギツグミ) - mistle thrush (Turdus viscivorus); missel thrush; stormcock
宿根: (しゅっこん) - fate predetermined from a prior existence
宿泊人: (しゅくはくにん) - lodger; boarder; paying guest
宿泊先: (しゅくはくさき) - lodging host; lodging place
宿泊券: (しゅくはくけん) - hotel voucher; accommodation voucher
宿泊客: (しゅくはくきゃく) - guest (esp. hotel)
宿泊数: (しゅくはくすう) - number of nights staying in accommodation
宿泊料: (しゅくはくりょう) - hotel charges
宿泊料金: (しゅくはくりょうきん) - accommodation charge; lodging charges; lodging fees
宿泊施設: (しゅくはくしせつ) - accommodations; lodging facilities; boarding house
宿泊者: (しゅくはくしゃ) - guest (esp. hotel); lodger
宿泊費: (しゅくはくひ) - hotel charge; lodging expense
宿無し: (やどなし) - homeless person; vagabond; tramp
宿直: (とのい) - night watch; night guard; night shift
宿直室: (しゅくちょくしつ) - night duty room
宿禰: (すくね) - Lord (title of respect for nobility, etc.); Sukune (third highest of the eight hereditary titles)
宿老: (しゅくろう) - old men; elders; seniors; veterans
宿題: (shukudai) - lição de casa, tarefa; questão pendente, problema não resolvido, questão em aberto
宿駅: (しゅくえき) - relay station; post station; stage
寂: (jaku/sabi) - loneliness , patina, antique look; elegant simplicity; well-trained voice
寂しがり屋: (さびしがりや) - lonely person; someone who easily succumbs to loneliness
寂しがる: (さびしがる) - to miss someone; to miss something; to feel lonely
寂しんぼう: (さびしんぼう) - lonely person; someone who easily succumbs to loneliness
寂しん坊: (さびしんぼう) - lonely person; someone who easily succumbs to loneliness
寂れる: (さびれる) - to decline (in prosperity)/to become deserted/to become desolate; to taper off (of a sound)
寂光: (じゃくこう) - light of wisdom (when nearing nirvana)/silent illumination; paradise/nirvana
寂寞: (じゃくまく) - loneliness/desolation; lonely/lonesome/dreary/desolate/deserted; harsh (words)/cutting (criticism); to separate in thought/to consider as independent
寂滅為楽: (じゃくめついらく) - (yoji) Freedom from one's desires (Entry into Nirvana) is true bliss
寂然: (じゃくねん) - lonely/desolate; (じゃくねん only) forlornness/desolation
寂莫: (じゃくまく) - loneliness/desolation; lonely/lonesome/dreary/desolate/deserted; harsh (words)/cutting (criticism); to separate in thought/to consider as independent
寂静: (せきせい) - calmness/stillness/tranquility; (じゃくじょう only)  calmness of the heart/enlightenment
